short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows you to like pages and follow multiple people at once

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows you to bulk click links on any website. Just Inspect (F12) the clickable link, add the css class selector and you are good to go. 

For example, if you would like to click all the links with a css class name "link", then enter that value in the first textbox. To avoid clicking on the same link, you can add another css class selector in the second textbox. For example a class name of already clicked like button might be "is-liked". 

Please email me or comment if you have any suggestions and any additional use cases for this tool . I personally use this to click all the likes on my facebook page at once.
